#summary The JCatapult Ant javadoc plugin

= Introduction =

This plugin provides applications with the ability to create JavaDoc from the Java source files.

This plugin contains a single XML file that should be imported like this:

{{{
<import file="${ant.home}/plugins-jcatapult/javadoc/1.0/javadoc.xml"/>
}}}

= Targets =

The plugin provides these targets:

== javadoc ==

Creates JavaDoc using the Java source files located in the _src/java/main_ directory.
